company.name: Top IT Industries Sdn Bhd
company.description: Top IT is an established organization that is Terengganu's answer to the fast-moving tech sector. The company specialized in restoring IT equipments, managing online database system and producing multimedia applications.

entries.entry: Fixed and restored faulty netbooks. Common issues were like corrupted operating system, faulty keyboard, faulty motherboard and various other software and hardware problems.

company.name: Capital Dynamics Sdn Bhd
company.description: Capital Dynamics is an independent fund management and investment advisory firm, without any ties to banks, insurers, stockbroking houses or political organisations.

entries.entry: Developing and maintaining Global Websites and web-based applications for in-house use.
In charge of front-end development using HTML5, Python, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Providing IT Support to customers who access our websites.
Maintaining and updating the company’s web-based applications, SDB3 and CMS3.

company.name: CTC Global Sdn Bhd
company.description: CTC Global Sdn Bhd (CTC Malaysia) is a wholly owned subsidiary of ITOCHU Techno-Solutions Corporation (CTC) and ITOCHU Corporation. In Malaysia, the CTC Malaysia team has been serving enterprise customers from major commercial and government sectors for over 40 years. Powered by a team of 600 qualified and experienced IT professionals, CTC Malaysia supports its customers through a country-wide network of 23 service centres and delivers its extensive portfolio of systems integration solutions to enable businesses to operate more efficiently.

entries.entry: Provide on-site support for desktop hardware, desktop applications, emails, printer and network related issues.
Install, uninstall, configure and support MS Windows OS, MS Windows applications and other user’s applications.
Perform on-site fix problem, troubleshooting and resolution.
Perform hardware and software moves, adds and changes.
Invoke problem escalation process to next level of support.
Carry out project roll out and installation.

company.name: CSE-EIS (M) Sdn Bhd
company.description: CSE-EIS (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd. is a wholly owned company of CSE Global (Asia) Limited (CSE). CSE is a leading systems integrator with an international presence of 38 offices spanning North America, Asia, Europe and the Middle East. The Group employs over 1,500 people wordlwide, with over 85 percent representing its design, engineering and project management capability and experience. That makes CSE one of the largest independent systems integrators of its kind.

entries.entry: In charge of LIMS (Laboratory Information Management System) for client companies. A heavily Java based software, with SQL/Oracle server.
Develop web pages and reporting system for the software.

company.name: Dream Catcher Software Hackathon Job Camp

entries.entry: Learned how to develop web and mobile application. Modules taught are HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks such as jQuery, Bootstrap and Ionic.
Competed in Software Hackathon against 32 other teams in developing an app within 24-hour. Things I had learned from participating in the competition:
entries: Experienced first-hand the stages in software development where we have to plan, develop, test, and deploy our application.
Learned how to generate an idea and developed the idea.
Learned how to solve big complex problem by breaking it down to smaller problems.
Learned how to work in a team and delegate tasks effectively in order to meet the objective within the time constraint and competition rules.

projects.name: Travel Scheduler
projects.description: A web application where the user can choose multiple desired places for a vacation and for how long. Based on the information, it calculates the distance between all of those places, time taken to reach every place, and how long the user can spend on each specific place. It will generate a time schedule to make it easy for the user to manage and plan the trip.

projects.name: Forward Scattering Radar (FSR) Target Signal Processing using Wavelet Technique
projects.description: The project looks into Wavelet Technique to extract detailed information on the target signals, in this case vehicles on the road. Research using the data collected by the radar, processing the signals obtained using two different wavelet technique(Haar and Meyer) by programming with MATLAB to extract unique values for multiple sample signals,then represents the signals in PSD spectrum and comparing the effectiveness between both wavelet techniques.

projects.name: Bluetooth Security Door Lock using Arduino
projects.description: Created a program to be run in Arduino microcontroller. The program integrates an Android phone with the Bluetooth module connected to Arduino, and uses it as a password receiver to unlock the door lock wirelessly.

projects.name: JavaScript Rock Paper Scissors game
projects.description: Created a JavaScript program to run a rock paper scissors game in your browser. Stored in Amazon Web Services (AWS).
